title: Shailene Woodley and Joe Alwyn are spotted on set while filming their new movie
text:
Shailene Woodley was seen on the set of her latest film, The Last Letter From Your Lover, on Monday.

The 27-year-old Big Little Lies star was in character as she shot a scene with Taylor Swift's boyfriend, 28-year-old actor Joe Alwyn.

The movie, which is based on the book by Jojo Moyes, is about a love affair that lasts over 40 years.

New movie: Joe Alwyn and Shailene Woodley are set to star in the new movie based on the book by Jojo Moyes, The Last Letter From Your Lover. Shailene is pictured above on set of the film on Monday afternoon in between takes

Joining the two actors in the film will also include Felicity Jones, 35, Callum Turner, 29, and Nabhaan Rizwan, 21.

On Monday, Joe and Shailene were spotted out on the first day of filming as they get into character for the new heartwarming love story.

Both stars were spotted in their 1960s attire as they chat with crew members in between shots on set.

The Secret Life of the American Teenager star wore a white sheer scarf tied around her hair and a blue dress with a faint floral pattern.

Getting ready: Joe gets ready for his turn to shoot his scenes before chatting it up in between takes

She carried around a drink on set and wore a pair of boots as she waited for her turn to film.

The story will follow Jones' character who plays a young journalist in London who discovers a series of love letters that tell the beautiful story of a love affair back in the 1960s between Woodley and Turner's characters.

She becomes so wrapped up in the story that she begins to uncover their identities while trying to figure out how the love story ends.

In action: Joe and Shailene are spotted getting ready to shoot a scene together as they chat with a crew member

The movie is set to take place in Mallorca for a couple of weeks before moving to the United Kingdom for the remainder of the film.

Alwyn is best known his performance in last year's movie The Favourite as well as his relationship with his girlfriend of three years, Swift.

The two met in 2016 and have been dating ever since but typically tend to keep a low profile with sightings of the couple few and far between.

Taylor recently released her latest studio album titled Lover which is essentially a love letter to her longtime beau.

Rare outing: Joe and his girlfriend Taylor Swift are spotted out in a rare outing last week after Taylor performed at SNL in early October

Joe's costar Shailene has made a name for herself by snagging the leading roles in movies such as Divergent and The Fault in Our Stars as well as the HBO series, Big Little Lies.

But when she's not acting, she's a major activist for the planet speaking out about single-use plastics and politics.

Currently, she is partnered with Parley for the Oceans and American Express to help clear the beaches around the world of plastics.
